extension.summary: Stream video from many difference sources
extension.description:
This addon uses trakt.tv for most show and movie meta data and uses a variety of websites for hoster sources
***This addon is developed and supported at [COLOR blue]www.tvaddons.ag[/COLOR]***

extension.summary: Hybrid สกินที่ปรับแต่งได้
Hybrid 一套可定制的皮肤
Hybrid 一套可客製化的佈景主題
extension.description: Hybrid is a customizable skin incorporating many of the now popular tweaks, addons and scripts.
Hybrid és una aparença personalitzable que incorpora molts dels ara populars ajustaments, complements i scripts.
Hybrid er et tilpasninsvenligt skin, som indarbejder mange af tidens populære tweaks, addons og scripts.
Hybrid ist ein anpasserbarer Skin der die beliebten Optimierungen, AddOns und Scripte umfasst.
Το Hybrid είναι ένα προσαρμόσιμο κέλυφος που περιλαμβάνει πολλά από τα πλέον δημοφιλή tweaks, πρόσθετα και scripts.
Hybrid is a customizable skin incorporating many of the now popular tweaks, addons and scripts.
Hybrid is a customisable skin incorporating many of the now popular tweaks, addons and scripts.
Hybrid is a customizable skin incorporating many of the now popular tweaks, addons and scripts.
Hybrid es un skin personalizable que incorpora muchos de los ajustes, addons y scripts más populares
Hybrid est un thème personalisable incluant de nombreux Add-ons, scripts et améliorations populaires
Hybride est un habillage personnalisable incorporant plusieurs peaufinages, addiciels et scripts.
Hybrid é un tema personalizábel que incorpora moitos dos axustes, complementos e scripts máis populares.
Hybrid je prilagodljiva presvlaka koja uključuje mnoga popularna podešavanja, dodatke i skripte.
A Hybrid testreszabható felszín, sok új finomhangolást, és módosítást tartalmaz a kiegészítők segítségével.
Hybrid는 사용자 설정이 가능한 스킨으로 최신 트윅, 애드온, 스크립트를 지원합니다.
Hybrid yra pritaikyta teminė išvaizda, į kurią įtraukta daugelis populiarių patobulinimų, priedų ir skriptų.
Hybrid merupakan kulit boleh disuai yang gabungkan banyak tweak, tambahan dan skrip yang kini popular.
Hybrid is een aanpasbare skin waarin veel van de nu populaire tweaks, addons en scripts in zijn verwerkt.
Hybrid er et tilpasningsvennlig skall som fungerer med mange av de populære tilpasninger, tillegg og skript.
Hybryda to skóra, którą możesz dopasować do własnych potrzeb, zawierająca wiele popularnych usprawnień, dodatków i skryptów.
Híbrido é um tema personalizável que incorpora muitos dos ajustes, add-ons e scripts mais populares.
Hybrid é uma skin personalizável que incorpora muitos tweaks, add-ons e scripts populares.
Hybrid является настраиваемой обложкой, включающей в себя множество новых популярных настроек, дополнений и скриптов.
Hybrid är ett anpassningsbart skal som innehåller många av dom nu populära anpassningarna, tilläggen och skripten.
Hybrid เป็นสกินที่ปรับแต่งได้ โดยผสมผสานการปรับแต่งอันหลากหลาย ที่นิยมในขณะนี้, ส้วนเสริม และ สคริปท์.
Hybrid是一套可定制的皮肤具备许多流行的改进，插件和脚本。
Hybridid是一套可客製化的佈景主題，並具備有許多受歡迎的調整項目，附加元件和脚本。

Du smadrer det - Du får lov at beholde stumperne
Was man kaputt macht darf man behalten
You break it - You get to keep the pieces
You break it - You get to keep the pieces
You break it - You get to keep the pieces
You break it - You get to keep the pieces

Vous le cassez, vous assumez!

Chi rompe... I cocci sono suoi
You break it - You get to keep the pieces
Anda leraikannya - Anda perlu kekalkan cebisannya
You break it - You get to keep the pieces
Hvis du ødelegger får du beholde bitene.
Zepsułeś - Pozbieraj kawałki

extension.summary: Soft gradients, pixel highlights and visible fanart
extension.description: (fuse)neue utilises low list viewtypes throughout the skin in order to showcase fanart. The home menu bar is accessible from anywhere by pressing up, minimising the need to ever "go home".

extension.news: - Added MPEG-DASH support for Kodi 17 w/ inputstream.mpd Add-on - Added optional Watch Later custom playlist to Settings -> Folders - Added Maintenance section to Settings - Added 'Subtitle language(s) to download' selection to Settings -> General
extension.description: YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube es un uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.
Данное дополнение позволяет находить и смотреть видео на всеми любимом сайте.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
Το YouTube είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες ιστοσελίδες διαμοιρασμού βίντεο στον κόσμο.
YouTube er en av verdens største nettsider for videodeling.

extension.summary: Desactive serviços do arranque no Kodi
extension.description: You can disable startup services, improving Kodi internal speed.
Pode desactivar serviços do arranque, melhorando a velocidade interna do Kodi.
extension.disclaimer: Opensource addon not endorsed with Team Kodi.
Addon opensource não afliado com a Equipa Kodi.

extension.description: Thanks for your faith in US, If you need assistance come and find us on facebook
Here you will find builds that we are not currently developing. These come with absolutely NO support
Thanks for your faith in US, If you need assistance come and find us on facebook
